XFCE tricks

Binding hardware volume control to mixer

Go to Settings > Keyboard > Shortcuts and add the following:

amixer set Master 5%+
amixer set Master 5%-
amixer set Master toggle

Source: http://schman.at/shortcuts-mit-xfce-setzen
